title: output.generator_profiles.schema
description: Statistics about the sources of generation, including solar PV, energy storage, traditional diesel, and from the grid (feeder)

Grid mix (kW).description: The amount of power provided from the grid (feeder) in kW

Solar DG (kW).description: The amount of power provided by solar PV sources kW

Energy storage (kW).description: The amount of power provided by energy storage sources in kW

Diesel DG (kW).description: The amount of power provided by tranditional diesel generation in kW
